downloadDescription: The Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) is for Windows operating system deployment.
detailsSection:
• The Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) is a free tool for automating Windows and Windows Server operating system deployment, leveraging the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) for Windows 10.
  • Version 8456 was released on January 25th 2019 and is the latest current version.
systemRequirementsSection:
Other Requirements
  • The Windows ADK for Windows 10, version 1809 or later, is required for all deployment scenarios.
  • Configuration Manager, version 1810 or later, is required for zero-touch installation (ZTI) and user-driven installation (UDI) scenarios.
installInstructionSection:
1. From the link above, download the installer for the proper system architecture.
  2. Run the .msi on the target MDT server.
    • Accept the Microsoft Software License Terms.
    • Follow the steps in the installation process to complete the installation.
  3. Start the Deployment Workbench desktop app from the Start menu in the Microsoft Deployment Toolkit group.
